ShipClass.Names: Kimba Huta; Thera Sita; Gemenon Traveler

(block (fleetlist)
(setq fleetlist (list 0xD25CEE0B 0xD25CEE0C 0xD25CEE0D 0xD25CEE0E 0xD25CEE0F 0xD25CEE10 0xD25CEE11 0xD25CEE12 0xD25CEE13 0xD25CEE14 0xD25CEE15 0xD25CEE16 0xD25CEE17 0xD25CEE18 0xD25CEE19 0xD25CEE1A 0xD25CEE1B 0xD25CEE1C 0xD25CEE1D 0xD25CEE1E 0xD25CEE1F 0xD25CEE20 0xD25CEE21 0xD25CEE22 0xD25CEE23 0xD25CEE24 0xD25CEE25 0xD25CEE26 0xD25CEE29 0xD25CEE2A 0xD25CEE2B 0xD25CEE2C 0xD25CEE2D))
; (for i 1 30 ; (block (temporaryNumber) ; (setq temporaryNumber 0xD25CEE0B) ; (setq fleetlist (Append fleetlist temporaryNumber)) ; (setq temporaryNumber (add temporaryNumber i)) ; ) ; )
(enum fleetlist theEnumShip (block (temporaryship) (setq temporaryship (sysCreateShip theEnumShip (ObjGetPos gPlayership) &svFriendlyAuton; "auton"))
